| History                 = The '''Soviet Space Program''' (Russian: Космическая программа СССР, Kosmicheskaya programma SSSR) comprised several of the rocket and space exploration programs conducted by the [[Soviet Union]]. 

===Events===
Over its sixty-year history during the [[Cold War (Event)|Cold War]], this primarily classified military program was responsible for a number of pioneering accomplishments in space flight; 

====Sputnik 1====
On October 4th, 1957, the Soviets launched the first man made object into space, [[Sputnik 1]]. A Russian hero enhanced by alien technology named himself Sputnik after this launch.{{r|Marvel Comics Presents Vol 3 2}}

====Sputnik 2====
The Soviets followed up with [[Sputnik 2]], carrying a dog named [[Laika (Earth-616)|Laika]]. Laika survived but was mutated in the mission and battled [[Department Zero (Earth-616)|Department Zero]].{{r|Agents of Atlas Vol 1 1}}

====First Man in Space====
On April 12, 1961, cosmonaut [[Yuri Gagarin (Earth-616)|Yuri Gagarin]] was the first [[Homo sapiens|human]] in [[space]] making one trip around the [[Earth Orbit]].{{r|Wolverine Vol 2 66}}{{r|Wolverine Vol 2 68}}

====Cosmo====
In the 1960's another dog named [[Cosmo (Dog) (Earth-616)|Cosmo]] was used as a test subject. He was launched into space but drifted off into space arriving in [[Knowhere]]. His travel through space mutated him giving him enhanced intelligence.{{r|Nova Vol 4 #8}}

====Neverlab====
In 1972, the Soviets launched the [[Neverlab]] space station into orbit in secret.{{r|Incredible Hulk Vol 3 #11}}

====Soviet Moon Landing====
On December 14th, 1972, [[Doctor Kuznetsov (Earth-616)|Doctor Kuznetsov]] sent his robotic creation [[Udarnik (Earth-616)|Udarnik]] to the moon. As nobody else had returned to the Moon ever since, Udarnki grew resentful of mankind.{{r|Iron Man: Fatal Frontier Infinite Comic Vol 1 2}} 

====Apollo–Soyuz Test Project====
In 1975, one of the Apollo Command Modules docked with a Soviet Soyuz capsule, and the astronauts shook hands. This was the beginning of the end of the space race.{{r|Uncanny Avengers Vol 3 9}}

====Collapse====
With the collapse of the Soviet Union, [[Russia]] created the Russian Aviation and Space Agency, now known as the [[Roscosmos (Earth-616)|Roscosmos]].
